homeExemptions.postDeathTreatment: subject to recovery from both probate and non-probate assets under expanded estate rules

recoveryTimeframes.statuteLimit: 4 months from estate notice or death

criteria: heir would face eviction or homelessness
property is sole source of income

incomeDisregards: incurred medical expenses may reduce countable income

spousalProtections.jointPropertyTreatment: may be subject to recovery under expanded estate recovery
additionalProtections: recovery may extend to estate of surviving spouse

administrative.agency: Minnesota Department of Human Services (DHS), Estate Recovery Program

effectiveStrategies: use irrevocable Medicaid Asset Protection Trusts (MAPTs)
avoid revocable trusts, life estates, and joint tenancy for asset protection
submit hardship waiver with financial and dependency documentation
plan spend-down for applicants over income limit
